website_summaries.verdict: A highly moisturizing conditioner with a nice fragrance that is formulated to enhance and improve thick, coarse hair while keeping frizz away.
pros: Contains shea butter and coconut oil that moisturize hair and tame frizz
Gives hair a healthy-looking glow and is made without sulfates and silicone
cons: May feel a bit heavy on some hair types, such as thin or straight locks

customer_reviews.title: Adds shine and helps to tame my Roseanne Rossana-danna hair.
customer_reviews.text: I keep coming back to this hair butter. Very pleasant fragrance and nice results. My hair is super thick and it helps to smooth and tame my tumbleweed head after I let it dry with natural waves and/or curls or before use flat iron or hot rollers. I also like to apply more liberally the night before I wash or co-wash for extra conditioning.
customer_reviews.author: robin brown

customer_reviews.title: I love the curls!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: All of my life I have fought with frizzly hair. I saw this and thought it was different, butter? I decided to give it a try. I wash my hair, towel dry and apply a thin coat to my hair. I comb it through to make sure it hits ever strand and the excess comes off on the comb, I comb my hair and then mess it up with my fingers. And I have curls!! People think I got a perm, I get a complement almost every day cause people were used to my frizzy head of hair. It keeps the curls in from wash to wash.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Hair Butter
customer_reviews.text: I've been an avid user of the OGX hair product line for quite some time. This is by far my favorite hair butter. To my disappointment, I can not find the product anywhere in stores anymore. Amazon seems to always make things that disappear reappear in my life! I have coarse Asian hair & this hair butter makes it so soft & smooth. The smell of it makes me want to eat it...you have to smell this to understand. People ask me all the time what I'm wearing & they don't believe me that it's my hair that smells so great!
customer_reviews.author: Yachai

customer_reviews.title: As good as it gets without a “professional” stamp.
customer_reviews.text: A pro salon stylist told me to find a shampoo/conditioner with certain qualities. After much research, I settled in this brand, particularly this “scent”. I use this twice a week, shampoo only at the roots and done twice, conditioner at the ends, once. My hair went from greasy with over saturated product use to soft and light. I also use a deep conditioner once a month to remove excess product. I can’t find this particular “scent” in stores so I’m happy it’s here.
customer_reviews.author: Amaren

customer_reviews.title: Nope. Not good for me.
customer_reviews.text: It smells good... I have 3 year old biracial triplet girls. I tried this based off a review on the Renewing argan of morocco one. Someone said it was better. Not in my opinion. I use these cheaper conditioners for detangling before I use my expensive good conditioner. The renewing argan of morocco is WAY better. It is slicker and detangles well. It conditions A LOT better.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs Mrabet

customer_reviews.title: Smell nice will not buy again
customer_reviews.text: The product was ok it does moisturizer hair not very good into keeping the hair frizz free.It gives my hair a dull look like I haven't done my hair in days.I will not buy this product again it's not thick and creamy more so water base smell nice,instead of keeping the frizz under control my hair styles look trouble I have to wear a hat to hide my hair.
customer_reviews.author: Tamara Smith

customer_reviews.title: Yummy and soft:)
customer_reviews.text: Im used to this brand but this particular one I have never seen before. I am so happy I gave it a try. It made my long natural hair soft and easier to detangle. Not to mention it smells so good. Like a soft vanilla cupcake scent. Would recommend to anyone with thick hair that dries to a frizz. I feel your pain as it is super annoying. Try this out hopefully you are pleased with the results such as me:)
customer_reviews.author: Asia W.

customer_reviews.title: My search stopped here
customer_reviews.text: I use this product to define my curls, and I love it!! It leaves my curls soft and bouncy. Everyone knows how difficult it is trying to find a product that's just right. So, if you're still figuring out what works best for you, I suggest trying THIS one. Great for transitioning to natural. Great as a leave-in.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for dry, thin hair
customer_reviews.text: This hair cream is so good for curly thin hair! I couldn’t believe how well it worked on my hair when other products didn’t would absolutely recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Sunilda A Sabino

customer_reviews.title: NEED EXTRA VOLUME? BuY Silicon Free Shea Soft & Smooth gives you extra volume to your root!!
customer_reviews.text: If you have thin hair and flat hair roots and need some extra volume, You MUST try "Silicon Free Shea Soft & Smooth" Shampoo (brown bottle). I bought 4 different kinds of OGX shampoo (red, brown, clear and pink bottle) and this is the best among all 5 so far for volume. Fragrance is 3 out of 5 but the result after blow dry hair is an Amazing!
customer_reviews.author: YooJung Karen Kim

customer_reviews.title: This product lives up to the claim I had some ...
customer_reviews.text: This product lives up to the claim I had some damage due to hairdresser issues when my hairdresser was out on leave and using flat iron. This creme helps smooth out your hair; I use it while my hair is still damp
customer_reviews.author: C. Allen

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't help with hydration at all
customer_reviews.text: Smells great but doesn't really do anything for tangles, dryness, ect. It's extremely light weight conditioner almost seems watered down
customer_reviews.author: Ksteffen0530

customer_reviews.title: Smells great and works well as a massage lotion
customer_reviews.text: Smells great and works well as a massage lotion. It does not taste as good as it smells, so don't let the word "butter" fool you.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Can’t disappoint. Perfect.
customer_reviews.text: This product is much better than most and texture and scent is on point.
customer_reviews.author: WTH

customer_reviews.title: great smell
customer_reviews.text: Smells great, works well just be cautious n don't use too much, your hair will be greasy. I use it on my grandsons hair to keep it from sticking up!
customer_reviews.author: B. Adkins

customer_reviews.title: Okay product
customer_reviews.text: This product makes my hair strands very smooth and soft! Although it is not moisturizing and I did not really like the smell. I have 4c/b low porosity hair.
customer_reviews.author: Marissa

customer_reviews.title: Butter or lotion!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I had previously used another hair butter from ogx, which was actually real hair butter. This one is loose and more like a lotion. Dries up the skin in a few minutes after applying.
customer_reviews.author: JERRY PAUL CHETHALAN

customer_reviews.title: pleased with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: I have wavy hair and when I don’t use this product my waves are not tamed and my hair is extremely frizzy. ever since I found this product it’s helped my hair for the days I want it natural. i’m so pleased with this purchase. I was sad that my local target didn’t have it but I am glad Amazon does.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Thick
customer_reviews.text: Thick product, not just for hair but body as well
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Wrede

customer_reviews.title: not the real stuff
customer_reviews.text: This has been diluted. it is not the same rich thick conditioner this brand usually has.
customer_reviews.author: mc

customer_reviews.title: DONT BUY THIS
customer_reviews.text: I don't know what girl they used to test this on but it wasn't one with course hair. This conditioner has no slip and it's not moisturizing. Literally the only thing good about this conditioner is that it smells good
customer_reviews.author: Symone

customer_reviews.title: Lovely, delicious scent!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is amazing! The scent is amazing, like warm sugar cookies, just YUM! The affect it has on my hair is better. No frizzies, lots of shine and bounce to my curls.
customer_reviews.author: Gwenn Mccourry

customer_reviews.title: This is one of the best products I have used for frizzy hair
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best products I have used for frizzy hair. It conditions and smooths and it lasts for days.
customer_reviews.author: Genna Corsentino

customer_reviews.title: Healthier hair but gets oily quickly
customer_reviews.text: I personally don't wash my hair more than 3-4 times a week because I consider that unhealthy for your hair so I don't like the fact that my hair gets oily within a day or to of shampooing. However, my hair feels extremely healthy and not even half as frizzy as before!
customer_reviews.author: Prerna Tolani

customer_reviews.title: Best Hair Product there is
customer_reviews.text: Best Hair Product there is....i hear a rumour it is being discontinued...THEY BETTER NOT, this smell is so decadent
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: Not so frizz-defy
customer_reviews.text: I was actually very surprised by the results. I have gone through many reviews before I have finally decided to order it. Used it for the first time on my hair and noticed that it made it more frizzy. Used it for the second time hoping it would get better. But no. I have also noticed that my hair fall has gotten worse. Not using it or buying it again!
customer_reviews.author: Siri

customer_reviews.title: Great moisturizer and detangler
customer_reviews.text: Really great value. Works extremely well on Damp hair, and replenish very dry hair. I have it in my cart to automatically refill every two weeks
customer_reviews.author: langston

customer_reviews.title: Smells good and works well
customer_reviews.text: I like the smell and the consistency of this product. It works very well to keep my hair smooth once I blow it dry.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Mitchell-Huey

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: I had this exact one before but this is not it it’s cheap and thin the only thing that’s correct is the scent
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite conditioner. It leaves my hair incredibly soft without making it heavy or greasy.
customer_reviews.author: Mercedes Geneine

customer_reviews.title: Feels so nice on hair!
customer_reviews.text: As long as you use it sparingly, this product smells wonderful and makes your hair very soft and manageable!
customer_reviews.author: Angela M. Whalen

customer_reviews.title: Smells so good!
customer_reviews.text: This is my very favorite shampoo and conditioner. I absolutely love the smell.
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful for curly hair
customer_reviews.text: Love this conditioner...does wonderful for curly hair and smells so good!
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: amazing conditioner but this product is spoiled - smelled sour!
customer_reviews.author: BBGW2011

customer_reviews.title: Wooooooowww
customer_reviews.text: It's smell s adorable and make z haire very shinyyyy & very soft
customer_reviews.author: Nermin

customer_reviews.title: More than just a great hair product!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! I use it on my hands as well as my hair!
customer_reviews.author: Amy L

customer_reviews.title: Product is good but the shipping made it burst open and spread ...
customer_reviews.text: Product is good but the shipping made it burst open and spread around my hair brush and hair dryer box
customer_reviews.author: Varun Reddy

customer_reviews.title: Smells great, oil-free, perfect for my hair
customer_reviews.text: This shampoo (and the matching conditioner) is amazing. For the record, I have very thick, long hair that tends to curl and gets easily dried out. Recently, I've stopped combing/brushing my hair because it just increases the frizziness of my hair. But my old shampoo and conditioners just weren't cutting it. I tried this on the off-chance that it would work, and boy did it! I washed it with the shampoo, throughly rinsed it, and then did the same with the condition. My hair is incredibly soft without being oily after using this. The scent is amazing too, without being overwhelming. I will be buying the bigger bottles of this stuff next time.
customer_reviews.author: H

customer_reviews.title: Not the same formula
customer_reviews.text: This is not the same formula as when buy it at a store. The "real" stuff is rich & thick & conditions so well without weighing down my thin, curvy hair. This, though, is watery & leaves a whole lot of buildup behind. The scent is similar, but not as strong. I will never order this one again because the difference is one is my favorite conditioner & the other is a very cheap knockoff.
customer_reviews.author: nic furiosa

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed for my curls
customer_reviews.text: I’m just starting the curly girl method and found this as an approved conditioner. The other one I was using was approved but it made my hair greasy feeling. This one is SO much better still gives volume without leaving my hair heavy or greasy. Smells great! I use it with the OGX damage remedy coconut miracle oil shampoo. Works great for my hair. Only downside is I can’t find it at a local store.
customer_reviews.author: A.Marie

customer_reviews.title: Smells Beachy Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: I used to have to constantly change out my shampoo and conditioner brands because after about a month or so they would start doing more damage than good to my hair. I have been using the shampoo and conditioner in this line for almost a year now and my hair looks healthy it is soft and frizz free!
customer_reviews.author: Shoshana

customer_reviews.title: Thin, water like conditioner that does not condition- but smells great.
customer_reviews.text: I love the shampoo, but the conditioner is Meh. The conditioner I received is thinner than the shampoo... it's more like water than conditioner. I have to use so much to get it through my hair and my hair does not feel conditioned afterwards. This is so disappointing because the shampoo is so fabulous and smells like heaven.
customer_reviews.author: A Acevedo

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Does not do what it says. This shampoo and conditioner are the worst I’ve ever used. My hair felt like straw when putting on. Didn’t feel sleek going on as my usual products do. Definitely not moisturizing and smoothing. Don’t waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: HomeShopper

customer_reviews.title: It smells fantastic, but I didn't notice much of a difference.
customer_reviews.text: This shampoo smells absolutely amazing. As what it does for my hair, well, I still can't air-dry it and look normal. It does cut down on some of the frizz, but I have the kind of hair that, I guess, has to be styled to see any real difference, no matter what shampoo or condition I use.
customer_reviews.author: Casey May

customer_reviews.title: Good shampoo with less chemicals
customer_reviews.text: I love this shampoo! The fact that it’s sulphate and silicon free at this price is a great deal. I have noticed that my hair doesn’t have a coating feeling as the shampoo is silicon free.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon_Customer

customer_reviews.title: Smells bad
customer_reviews.text: I couldn’t even you said the smell was so strong .
customer_reviews.author: claudia

customer_reviews.title: Keeps your hair smelling clean when you don’t wash it
customer_reviews.text: I love this product!! Keeps your hair smelling clean when you don’t wash it. It’s not good to wash your hair daily but after a workout, I needed something to make my Hair smell descent. This did the trick. A little goes a long way. And it helped with the frizz
customer_reviews.author: Cristal Outman

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: This shampoo saved my hair. It’s coarse, curly, and dry. This makes my hair soft (!) And well moisturized.
customer_reviews.author: Retrospective

customer_reviews.title: OGX did it again!
customer_reviews.text: Smooths my thick tresses, fragrant smell that gets you noticed, exceeds expectations just like all products in the OGX brand line of hair care products!
customer_reviews.author: Ann-Louise

customer_reviews.title: Great product, great seller
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about this product. Thank you to the seller for delivering so quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Irene

customer_reviews.title: Smells so good!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product, can’t seem to find it on the grocery shelves anymore. Thankful to have found it on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: N. Fletcher

customer_reviews.title: Best smelling conditioner I've ever tried, I'm addicted!
customer_reviews.text: The smell of this conditioner is out of the world and I always get compliments on how nice my hair smells. It's also a good price and does a decent job of conditioning.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Suspicious
customer_reviews.text: I’m suspicious of the bottle. The lid was on backwards - opening toward the back not front. And it was full to the middle of he word smooth not to the same level the matching shaanpoo I juts ordered. Not cool. I hope the manufacturer will send me a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: m

customer_reviews.title: Love it, strongly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Nice, my hair in one WAsed it was amazing, I love this product
customer_reviews.author: Tu 😃

customer_reviews.title: Smells awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I love to use this as a leave-in conditioner. Smells amazing! You only need to use a small amount (at least for my hair) but doesn't leave your hair weighed down.
customer_reviews.author: Monica Flink

customer_reviews.title: Smells sweet
customer_reviews.text: I liked the scent and it cleansed the scalp well.
customer_reviews.author: Sally Elias

customer_reviews.title: ... her go-to product to make sure her hair is perfect every day for work
customer_reviews.text: My wife is in the military and this is her go-to product to make sure her hair is perfect every day for work.
customer_reviews.author: Daksby

customer_reviews.title: Love this stuff
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff. Works great on curly hair That's prone to frizzing, or looking dry. Moisturizes with out looking oily.
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Just ok , I thing noticeable with my hair being less frizzy
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Rae

customer_reviews.title: I love this scent
customer_reviews.text: Fabulous scent! The shampoo is thick, creamy and makes my hair feel super clean and soft.
customer_reviews.author: A Acevedo

customer_reviews.title: Great hair product
customer_reviews.text: This product works well on my hair. It's not sticky and it doesn't make my hair a helmet. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Choney

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the way it leaves my hair feeling and smelling
customer_reviews.author: j knox

customer_reviews.title: The smell of this is nauseating and it makes my ...
customer_reviews.text: The smell of this is nauseating and it makes my hair heavy. I have thick, naturally curly ethnic hair.
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: Bad packaging
customer_reviews.text: I received one of my bottle opened and spilled out in the bag. Not good
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: OGX Frizz-Defy/Moisture + Shea Soft & Smooth Conditioner, 13 Ounce
product_meta.description: Style Name:ConditionerOgx Frizz-Defy Moisture Plus Shea Soft And Smooth Hair Conditioner An intensely moisture-rich, creamy blend with shea butter, agave nectar and coconut oil. It helps to smooth and soften coarse tresses, for hair that looks healthy with a silky, shiny glow, Soft smooth hair, Beauty, pure and simple, Gives hair silky, shiny glow Softens coarse tresses For thick, coarse hair Defrizzes strands.

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
